metadata.synopsis: Player can initiate the first romance scene from this branch.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Triggers if players choose the option that Laezel has been looking at them differently in the InParty dialog which starts the Dating night scene.

49.speaker: Lae'zel
49.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

10.speaker: Lae'zel
10.text: I was too hasty to judge you.
10.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

6.speaker: Lae'zel
6.text: I thought you witless, gutless, unimpressively bland.
6.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

19.speaker: Player
19.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

13.speaker: Lae'zel
13.text: Now, well - you've earned my respect, and more still. You've proven your wits. You are efficient and dominant, in and out of battle.

28.speaker: Lae'zel
28.text: You've proven your courage. I swear, you would tear the horns off one dragon to plunge into another.

20.speaker: Lae'zel
20.text: And you're hardly bland. Your scent alone is enough to make my neck sweat and my hairs stand on end.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: And I thought you cruel, stubborn, and judgemental.
17.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

37.speaker: Lae'zel
37.text: Yes. All that is true. I am cold as the Sea of Night -
37.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

55.speaker: Lae'zel
55.text: - but you have stoked fires I didn't know I possessed.
55.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

3.speaker: Lae'zel
3.text: I swear, you would tear the horns off one dragon for plunging into another.
3.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

18.speaker: Lae'zel
18.text: You've gained my respect, and more still, my yearning.
18.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

43.speaker: Lae'zel
43.text: When I come near, your odour alone is enough to make my neck sweat and my hairs stand on end.
43.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

14.speaker: Player
14.text: Given our prior hostilities, you'd think I wouldn't feel the same way - but I do.
14.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

57.speaker: Player
57.text: If you respect me so much, then why are you such a prickly grouch?
57.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

23.speaker: Lae'zel
23.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

38.speaker: Lae'zel
38.text: Vlaakith requires everything of her children. Think of how many bruises you've inflicted, how much blood you've drawn in the Undying Queen's name.
38.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

26.speaker: Lae'zel
26.text: Vlaakith requires everything of her children. I can't count how many bruises I've inflicted, can't measure how much blood I've drawn in the Undying Queen's name.
26.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

5.speaker: Lae'zel
5.text: I know only blood-red and death-black. My mind is silver and my body steel.
5.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

29.speaker: Lae'zel
29.text: I am what I must be, say what I must be, to survive every beast I face and every wound I bear.
29.context: NodeContext: A slight bit of tenderness

50.speaker: Lae'zel
50.text: Bah - enough talk. I will be plain: I want to taste you. Perhaps tonight. Perhaps later. But I want it all the same.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: Hold on. Are you coming on to me?
53.context: NodeContext: Do YOU? As in, do YOU want to have sex tonight?

9.speaker: Player
9.text: The attraction's mutual, Lae'zel. You know how to set my heart racing.
9.context: NodeContext: Do YOU? As in, do YOU want to have sex tonight?

7.speaker: Lae'zel
7.context: NodeContext: Do YOU? As in, do YOU want to have sex tonight?

27.speaker: Lae'zel
27.text: I want to taste you. Perhaps tonight. Perhaps later. But I want it all the same.
27.context: NodeContext: Do YOU? As in, do YOU want to have sex tonight?

33.speaker: Lae'zel
33.context: NodeContext: Do YOU? As in, do YOU want to have sex tonight?

24.speaker: Player
24.text: Yes. I want to share my body with you.
24.context: NodeContext: Said with a sexy, steely confidence.

51.speaker: Player
51.text: Sure thing. I've been wanting a hot githyanki girlfriend.
51.context: NodeContext: Said with a sexy, steely confidence.

41.speaker: Lae'zel
41.text: I won't be your girlfriend. But I will be your lay.
41.context: NodeContext: Said with a sexy, steely confidence.

21.speaker: Lae'zel
21.context: NodeContext: Said with a sexy, steely confidence.

4.speaker: Player
4.context: NodeContext: Said with a sexy, steely confidence.

16.speaker: Lae'zel
16.context: NodeContext: Said with a sexy, steely confidence.

42.speaker: Lae'zel
42.text: Perhaps one night soon, I will come to your bunk and take what is mine.

22.speaker: Lae'zel
22.text: Until that night comes - I shall keep enjoying your scent.

30.speaker: Lae'zel
30.text: One day soon, you will wonder how my lips might have tasted, how my fingers on your skin might have felt.

12.speaker: Lae'zel
12.text: And you will wish you could return to this lost moment.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: I'm flattered, but the answer is 'no'.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: Can I assume a compliment is incoming?

45.speaker: Lae'zel
45.text: I don't pay compliments. I only say what is true.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: I don't care what you think. The only approval I require is our queen's.

39.speaker: Lae'zel
39.text: Tsk'va. Which makes you all the more tempting.

56.speaker: Lae'zel
56.text: You've proven me wrong at every turn. You are efficient. Dominant. Courageous.

58.speaker: Lae'zel
58.text: I hadn't thought myself so transparent.

2.speaker: Lae'zel
2.text: I hadn't thought myself so transparent.

31.speaker: Lae'zel
31.text: Well - you'd be a succulent meal. I would like to have gorged.

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: But you've been prodded and picked over like a suckling boar. I prefer fresher meat.

34.speaker: Lae'zel
34.text: So you noticed. Yes, you caught my eye. You've caught someone else's, too.

46.speaker: Lae'zel
46.text: I'm sure you'll please each other quite thoroughly.
